KSHMR Announced to Headline Quebec's ‘Unity Electro Fest'

Mark your calendars; on June 10, 2022, the Bytown Blog! and Ottawa Shufflers Community are teaming up for their first official EDM Rave! With the promise of a stacked local lineup, shuffle class, and a killer neon theme, you won't want to miss it!
